f.name: southey
f.string: King Perion having departed from

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Partido el rey Perión de la Pequeña Bretaña como ya se vos contó:

f.name: southey
f.string: Alima

f.name: southey
f.string: went his way in great heaviness,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: de mucha congoxa era su aio atormentado:

f.name: southey
f.string: as well as for the loneliness

f.name: montalvo
f.string: assí por la gran soledad

f.name: southey
f.string: wherein he had leftElisena

f.name: southey
f.string: whom in his heart he loved,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: que de su amiga sentía que mucho de coraçón amava/

f.name: southey
f.string: as also for the dream which in such a season had come upon him.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: como por el sueño que ya oísteis que en tal sazón le sobreviniera.

f.name: southey
f.string: But having reached his own country, he sent for all his great Lords,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Pues llegado en su reino embió por todos sus ricos hombres/

f.name: southey
f.string: and ordered the Bishops to bring with them the most learned Clerks in their parts,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y mandó a los obispos que consigo traxessen los más sabidores clérigos que en sus tierras avía:

f.name: southey
f.string: to the end they might expound his dream.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: esto para que aquel sueño le declarassen.

f.name: southey
f.string: When his vassals knew of his return,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Como sus vassallos de su venida supieron:

f.name: southey
f.string: many others, as well as all who were summoned, came with great desire to see him who was beloved of all.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: assí los llamados como muchos de los otros a él se vinieron con gran desseo de lo ver que de todos era muy amado:

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y muchas vezes eran sus coraçones atormentados: oyendo las grandes afrentas en armas que él se ponía: temiendo de lo perder: y por esto desseavan todos tenerlo consigo: mas no lo podían acabar: que su fuerte coraçón no era contento sino cuando el cuerpo ponía en los grandes peligros.

f.name: southey
f.string: The King conferred with them on the state of the realm

f.name: montalvo
f.string: El rey habló con ellos en el estado del reino:

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y en las otras cosas que a su hazienda cumplían:

f.name: southey
f.string: but it was alway with a sad countenance,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: pero siempre con triste semblante:

f.name: southey
f.string: whereby they were much afflicted;

f.name: montalvo
f.string: de que a ellos gran pesar redundava:

f.name: southey
f.string: and this business being dispatched, he dismissed them each to his own lands,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y despachados los negocios mandó que a sus tierras se bolviessen:

f.name: southey
f.string: only staying with him three Clerks whom he knew was the most skilful in what he desired to learn.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: e hizo quedar consigo tres clérigos que supo que más sabían en aquello que él desseava:

f.name: southey
f.string: These men he took into his Chapel,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y tomándolos consigo se fue a su capilla:

f.name: southey
f.string: and there upon the sacred Host he made them swear

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y allí en la ostia sagrada les hizo jurar/

f.name: southey
f.string: to answer truly what he should demand,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: que en lo que él les preguntasse verdad le dixessen:

f.name: southey
f.string: without fear, how dangerous soever it were.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: no temiendo ninguna cosa por grave que se le mostrasse:

f.name: southey
f.string: That done

f.name: montalvo
f.string: esto fecho mandó salir fuera al capellán y él quedó solo con ellos.

f.name: southey
f.string: they left the Chapel,

f.name: southey
f.string: and he told them his dream.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Entonces les contó el sueño como es ya devisado y dixo que se lo soltassen lo que de ello podía ocurrir.

f.name: southey
f.string: Then one of them whose name was Ungan the Picard, the most expert of them, thus answered,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: El uno de estos que Ungan el Picardo avía nombre que era el que más sabía dixo.

f.name: southey
f.string: Dreams Sire are vain things, and for such ought to be esteemed;

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Señor los sueños es cosa vana y por tal deven ser tenidos:

f.name: southey
f.string: notwithstanding seeing it is your pleasure that some account should be made of yours, give us time to consider thereon.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: pero pues vos plaze que en algo este vuestro tenido sea dadnos plazo en que lo podamos ver.

f.name: southey
f.string: Let it be so, said the King;

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Assí sea dixo el rey/

f.name: southey
f.string: take twelve days

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y tomad .xii. días para ello:

f.name: southey
f.string: and he ordered them to be separated, that they should neither see nor converse with each other.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y mandólos apartar que se no hablassen ni viessen en aquel tiempo.

f.name: southey
f.string: They to their uttermost travailed upon this matter,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Ellos echaron sus juizios y firmezas cada uno como mejor supo:

f.name: southey
f.string: and when the time was elapsed they went to the King.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y llegado el tiempo viniéronse para el rey:

f.name: southey
f.string: He first took Alberto of Champaigne apart, and said to him,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: el cual tomó aparte a Alberto de Campania:

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y díxole.

f.name: southey
f.string: you know what you have sworn,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Ya sabéis lo que me jurastes:

f.name: southey
f.string: --now then speak

f.name: montalvo
f.string: agora dezid .

f.name: southey
f.string: to me.Sire,

f.name: southey
f.string: answered

f.name: montalvo
f.string: dixo el clérigo:

f.name: southey
f.string: Alberto,

f.name: southey
f.string: then let the rest be called into your presence

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Pues vengan los otros

f.name: southey
f.string: for before them will I tell you.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y delante de ellos lo diré:

f.name: montalvo
f.string: vengan dixo el rey:

f.name: southey
f.string: Whereupon

f.name: southey
f.string: they were sent for,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: e hízolos llamar.

f.name: southey
f.string: and being all met,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Pues siendo assí todos juntos

f.name: southey
f.string: Alberto

f.name: southey
f.string: began.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: aquel dixo.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Señor yo te diré lo que entiendo.

f.name: southey
f.string: It appears to me that the closed chamber,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: A mí parece de la cámara que era bien cerrada:

f.name: southey
f.string: and he whom you saw enter by the secret door,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y que viste por la menor puerta de ella entrar:

f.name: southey
f.string: signify this realm which is close and well guarded, nevertheless some one shall enter to take it from you,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: significa estar este tu reyno cerrado y guardado que por alguna parte de él te entrará alguno para te tomar algo:

f.name: southey
f.string: and like as he thrust his hand into your side and rent forth your heart and threw it into the river,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y assí como la mano te metía por los costados y sacava el coraçón y lo echava en un río/

f.name: southey
f.string: even so shall town or Castle be taken from you, and put into his hand from whom you shall not easily recover them.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: assí te tomará villa o castillo y lo porná en poder de quien aver no lo podrás:

f.name: southey
f.string: And the other heart? quoth the King, which he said should remain with me,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y el otro coraçón dixo el rey que me dezía que me quedava/

f.name: southey
f.string: and yet he must take it away against his will.It seemeth by this, answered

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y me lo haría perder sin su grado.

f.name: southey
f.string: Alberto,

f.name: southey
f.string: that some other shall invade your country, as the first did, yet constrained more by another commanding him to do so, than by any will in himself,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Esso dixo el maestro parece que otro entrará en tu tierra a te tomar lo semejante más constreñido por fuerça de alguno que se lo mande que de su voluntad:

f.name: southey
f.string: and upon this, Sire, I know nothing more to say.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y en este caso no sé señor que más vos diga.

f.name: southey
f.string: The King then commanded Anteles to say what he had discovered.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: El rey mandó al otro que Anteles avía nombre que dixesse lo que hallava.

f.name: southey
f.string: He agreed to all that the other had said,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Él otorgó en todo lo que el otro avía dicho:

f.name: southey
f.string: except in this

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Sino

f.name: southey
f.string: quoth he,

f.name: southey
f.string: that my art shows me
mis suertes me muestran.
it is already done,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: tanto que mis suertes me muestran que es ya hecho:

f.name: southey
f.string: and by the person that most loveth ye:

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y por aquel que más te ama:

f.name: southey
f.string: this makes me marvel,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y esto me haze maravillar:

f.name: southey
f.string: for nothing of your Kingdom is yet lost,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: porque aún agora no es perdido nada de tu reino:

f.name: southey
f.string: and if it were, it could not be by one who loves you so dearly.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y si lo fuere no sería por persona que mucho te ama.

f.name: southey
f.string: Hearing this the King smiled a little, for it seemed he had said
que no avia dicho nada.
something.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Oído esto por el rey sonrióse un poco que le paresció que no avía dicho nada.

f.name: southey
f.string: But Ungan the Picard who knew much more then they, held down his head and laughed heartily,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Mas Ungan el Picardo que mucho más que ellos sabía baxó la cabeça y rióse más de coraçón:

f.name: southey
f.string: a thing which he had seldom done, being by nature a thoughtful and melancholy man.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: aunque lo hazía pocas vezes que de su natural era hombre esquivo y triste.

f.name: southey
f.string: The King wondered at this, and said,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: El rey miró en ello y díxole.

f.name: southey
f.string: now Master tell us what you know.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Agora maestro dezid lo que supierdes.

f.name: southey
f.string: Sire, said he, peradventure I have seen into things which should be manifested to you alone,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Señordixo él por ventura yo vi cosas que no es menester de las manifestar sino a ti solo:

f.name: southey
f.string: therefore let these depart.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: pues sálganse todos fuera dixo él:

f.name: southey
f.string: Then the doors were closed and they twain remained together.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y cerrando las puertas quedaron ambos.

f.name: southey
f.string: Know, King,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Sabed rey

f.name: southey
f.string: said he,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: El maestro dixo.

f.name: southey
f.string: that what I laughed at was a word of which you thought little,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Sabed rey que de lo que yo me reía fue de aquellas palabras que en poco tuviste:

f.name: southey
f.string: when he said it was already done, and by the person who best loveth ye.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: que dixo que ya era hecho por aquél que más te ama.

f.name: southey
f.string: Now shall I reveal what you keep closely concealed

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Agora te quiero dezir aquello que muy encubierto tienes:

f.name: southey
f.string: and think that none knows.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y piensas que ninguno lo sabe.

f.name: southey
f.string: You love, where you have already accomplished your will,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Tú amas en tal lugar donde ya la voluntad compliste/

f.name: southey
f.string: and she whom you love is marvellously fair;

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y la que más es maravillosamente fermosa:

f.name: southey
f.string: then told he all the fashions of her as if she were there before him.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y díxole todas las faiciones de ella como si delante la tuviera.

f.name: southey
f.string: The chamber in which you saw yourself enclosed,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Y de la cámara en que vos veíades encerrado/

f.name: southey
f.string: you well know,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: esto claro lo sabéis:

f.name: southey
f.string: and how she to ease your heart and her own,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y cómo ella queriendo quitar de vuestro coraçón y del suyo aquellas cuitas y congoxas:

f.name: southey
f.string: entered without your knowledge by the secret door;

f.name: montalvo
f.string: quiso sin vuestra sabiduría entrar por la puerta de que te no catavas:

f.name: southey
f.string: and the hand that opened your side,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y las manos que a los costados metía:

f.name: southey
f.string: is your union,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: es el juntamiento de ambos:

f.name: southey
f.string: and the heart which was taken out sheweth that she hath by you a son or a daughter.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y el coraçón que sacava significa hijo o hija que avrá de vos.

f.name: southey
f.string: Master, said the King, what meaneth then the casting thereof into the river?

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Pues maestro dixo el rey qué es lo que muestra que lo echava en un río.

f.name: southey
f.string: He replied, seek not to know

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Esso señor dixo él no lo quieras saber:

f.name: southey
f.string: that which is of no importance.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: que te no tiene pro alguna.

f.name: southey
f.string: Tell me howbeit, quoth Perion, and fear nothing.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Todavíadixo él me lo dezid y no temáis.

f.name: southey
f.string: Since you are pleased to hear it, answered Ungan, I demand assurance that for any thing which I may reveal, you will never hereafter be wrath with her who loveth you so loyally;

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Pues que assí te plaze dixo Ungan quiero de ti fianza que por cosa que aquí diga no avrás saña de aquella que tanto te ama en ninguna sazón:

f.name: southey
f.string: and Perion made the promise.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Yo lo prometo dixo el rey.

f.name: southey
f.string: Know then, said the Master, that what you saw cast into the river,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Pues sabe dixo él que lo que en el río viades lançar/

f.name: southey
f.string: is the child which she has had by you.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: es que será assí echado el hijo que de vos oviere.

f.name: southey
f.string: And that other heart that remained?what should that be?

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Y el otro coraçón dixo el rey que me queda qué será?.

f.name: southey
f.string: —You may interpret the one by the other, answered

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Bien deves entender dixo el maestro lo uno por lo otro:

f.name: southey
f.string: Ungan:

f.name: southey
f.string: you will have another son,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: que es que avréis otro hijo/

f.name: southey
f.string: who will in some manner be taken away against the will of her that caused the loss of the first.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y por alguna guisa lo perderéis contra la voluntad de aquella que agora vos hará el primero perder.

f.name: southey
f.string: Strange things hast thou told me! said

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Grandes cosas me avéis dicho dixo el rey

f.name: southey
f.string: Perion,

f.name: southey
f.string: and may it please God that the latter part, the misfortunes of my children, prove not so true as what thou hast told me concerning the Lady whom I love.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Grandes cosas me avéis dicho dixo el rey y a Dios plega por la su merced que lo postrimero de los hijos no salga tan verdadero como lo que de la dueña que yo amo me dexistes.

f.name: southey
f.string: The Master answered, None can alter the things which were ordained by God, nor know wherein they shall end.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Las cosas ordenadas y permitidas de Dios dixo el maestro no las puede ninguno estorvar ni saber en qué pararán/

f.name: southey
f.string: Men therefore should neither repine nor rejoice thereat,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y por esto los hombres no se deven contristar ni alegrar con ellas:

f.name: southey
f.string: for oftentimes as well the evil as the good proves far otherwise than it seemed.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: porque muchas vezes assí lo malo como lo bueno que de ellas a su parecer ocurrirles puede suceder de otra forma que ellos esperavan.

f.name: southey
f.string: And do thou O King, lay aside from thy memory all this which thou wast so solicitous to know, and pray to God to dispose these things to his holy service.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Y tú noble rey perdiendo de tu memoria todo esto que aquí con tanta afición has querido saber recoge en ella de siempre rogar a Dios que en esto y en todo lo ál haga lo que su santo servicio sea porque aquello sin duda es lo mejor.

f.name: southey
f.string: The King was satisfied in what he desired,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: El rey Perión quedó muy satisfecho de lo que desseava saber:

f.name: southey
f.string: and so pleased with the wisdom and the last words of Ungan the Picard,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y mucho más de este consejo de Ungan el Picardo:

f.name: southey
f.string: that he rewarded him well,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: haziéndole mucho bien y mercedes.

f.name: southey
f.string: and kept him thenceforward near his person.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y siempre cabe sí lo tuvo/

f.name: southey
f.string: As Perion parted from the Clerks,

f.name: southey
f.string: he met a Damsel more ornamented than beautiful, who said to him,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Y saliendo al palacio halló una donzella más guarnida de atavíos que hermosa y díxole.

f.name: southey
f.string: know King Perion, that when thou recoverest thy loss,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Sabe rey Perión que cuando tu pérdida cobrares:

f.name: southey
f.string: the kingdom of Ireland shall lose its flower!

f.name: montalvo
f.string: perderá el señorío de Irlanda su flor:

f.name: southey
f.string: and away she went, so that he could not detain her,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y fuesse que no la pudo detener.

f.name: southey
f.string: and he remained thinking upon these things.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Assí quedó el rey pensando en esto y otras cosas.

f.name: southey
f.string: The Author ceaseth to speak of this, and returneth to the child whom Gandales brought up.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: ¶El auctor dexa de hablar de esto y torna al donzel que Gandales criava:

f.name: southey
f.string: He was called the
Footnote: We have no word for the Donzel of the Spaniards, and Damoisel of the French.
Child of the Sea, for so they had named him,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: el cual el Donzel del Mar se llamava que assí le pusieron nombre:

f.name: southey
f.string: and with much care was he brought up by that good Knight and his wife,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y criávase con mucho cuidado de aquel cavallero don Gandales y de su muger:

f.name: southey
f.string: and he grew

f.name: southey
f.string: and became so fair,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y hazíase tan hermoso/

f.name: southey
f.string: that all who saw him marvailed.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: que todos los que lo veían se maravillavan.

f.name: southey
f.string: One day Gandales rode forth,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Y un día cavalgó Gandales armado/

f.name: southey
f.string: for he was a right good Knight and strong,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: que en gran manera era buen cavallero y muy esforçado:

f.name: southey
f.string: and always accompanied King Languines at such time as they followed arms,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y siempre se acompañara con el rey Languines en el tiempo que las armas seguían.

f.name: southey
f.string: and though the King had ceased to follow them, yet Gandales ceased not.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Y aunque el rey de seguirlas dexasse no lo hizo él assí:

f.name: montalvo
f.string: antes las usava mucho:

f.name: southey
f.string: He, as he rode along, met a Damsel, that thus spake to him.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y yendo assí armado como os digo halló una donzella que le dixo.

f.name: southey
f.string: Ah, Gandales if many great personages knew what I know,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Ay Gandales si supiessen muchos altos hombres lo que yo agora:

f.name: southey
f.string: they would cut off thy head!

f.name: montalvo
f.string: cortarte ían la cabeça:

f.name: southey
f.string: Wherefore? quoth he.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Por qué? dixo él.

f.name: southey
f.string: She replied, Because thou nourishest their death.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Porque tú guardas la su muerte dixo ella:

f.name: southey
f.string: Now this was the Damsel who had prophesied to King Perion.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Y sabed que ésta era la donzella que le dixo al rey Perión:

f.name: montalvo
f.string: que cuando fuesse su pérdida cobrada/ perdería el señorío de Irlanda su flor.

f.name: southey
f.string: But Gandales understood not, and he said

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Gandales que no lo entendía dixo.

f.name: southey
f.string: Damsel I beseech ye for God’s sake, what is this?

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Donzella por Dios os ruego que me digáis qué es esso .

f.name: southey
f.string: I shall not tell thee, she answered, but so it must be.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: No te lo diré dixo ella mas todavía assí averná:

f.name: southey
f.string: And she went her way.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Y partiéndose de él se fue su vía.

f.name: southey
f.string: He remained thoughtful, but soon he saw her returning upon her palfrey with all speed, and crying with a loud voice,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Gandales quedó cuidando en lo que dixera y a cabo de una pieça vióla tornar muy aína en su palafrén diziendo a grandes voces:

f.name: southey
f.string: Gandales help me–-or I am dead!

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Ay Gandales acórreme que muerta soy.

f.name: southey
f.string: He looked and saw a Knight come after her, sword in hand,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Él cató y vio venir en pos de ella un cavallero armado con su espada en la mano:

f.name: southey
f.string: and he spurred his horse between them, and cryed out,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y Gandales hirió el cavallo de las espuelas y metióse entre ambos y dixo.

f.name: southey
f.string: Sir Knight, God
A quien Dios de ma’a ventura. It is the Irish phrase, Bad luck to you!
confound thee,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Don cavallero a quien Dios dé mala ventura/

f.name: southey
f.string: what wouldst thou with the Damsel?

f.name: montalvo
f.string: qué queréis a la donzella?

f.name: southey
f.string: What? said the other, wouldst thou protect her, who by her art has made me lose body and soul?

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Cómodixo él queréis la vos amparar a ésta que por engaño me trae perdido el cuerpo y el alma?

f.name: southey
f.string: Of that know I nothing, said Gandales,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: De esso no sé nada dixo Gandales:

f.name: southey
f.string: but protect her I will,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: mas ampararvos la he yo:

f.name: southey
f.string: for women are not to be thus punished,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: porque mugeres no han de ser por esta vía castigadas:

f.name: southey
f.string: even though they deserve it.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: aunque lo merezcan.

f.name: southey
f.string: The Knight answered, that we shall see, and returning his sword into the scabbard, he rode to a little thicket wherein there waited a Damsel exceedingly fair,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Agora lo veréis dixo el cavallero y metiendo su espada en la vaina tornóse a una arboleda donde estava una donzella muy hermosa:

f.name: southey
f.string: who gave him a shield and a lance,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: que le dio un escudo y una lança:

f.name: southey
f.string: and then he ran at Gandales,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y diose a correr contra Gandales:

f.name: southey
f.string: and Gandales at him.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y Gandales a él:

f.name: montalvo
f.string: e hiriéronse con las lanças en los escudos: assí que bolaron en pieças: y juntáronse de los cavallos y de los cuerpos de consuno tan bravamente que cayeron a sendas partes y los cavallos con ellos: y cada uno se levantó lo más presto que pudo: y ovieron su batalla assí a pie:

f.name: southey
f.string: They had not long fought before she who had desired succour of Gandales, stepped between them, and cried,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: mas no duró mucho que la donzella que fuía se metió entre ellos y dixo.

f.name: southey
f.string: hold!

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Cavalleros estad quedos.

f.name: southey
f.string: Forthwith the Knight who had pursued her drew back,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: El cavallero que tras ella venía quitóse luego afuera:

f.name: southey
f.string: and she said to him--

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y ella le dixo:

f.name: southey
f.string: come, make obeisance to me!

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Venid a mi obediencia.

f.name: southey
f.string: that shall I do willingly, said he, as to the thing in the world which I most love:

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Iré de grado dixo él como a la cosa del mundo que más amo:

f.name: southey
f.string: and throwing the shield from his neck, and the sword from his hand,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y echando el escudo del cuello y la espada de la mano

f.name: southey
f.string: he bent his knees before her,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: hincó los inojos ante ella:

f.name: southey
f.string: to the wonder of Gandales;

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y Gandales fue ende mucho maravillado:

f.name: southey
f.string: then she bade him

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y ella dixo al cavallero que ante sí tenía:

f.name: southey
f.string: tell the Damsel under the trees, to get her away immediately, or he would take her head off.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Dezid a aquella donzella de so el árbol que se vaya luego si no que la tajaredes la cabeça.

f.name: southey
f.string: He turned to her

f.name: montalvo
f.string: El cavallero se tornó contra ella/

f.name: southey
f.string: and exclaimed,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y díxole.

f.name: southey
f.string: Thou ill woman! I know not why I spare thee.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Ay mala yo me maravillo que la cabeça no te tiro.

f.name: southey
f.string: And the Damsel saw that her friend was enchanted,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: La donzella vio que su amigo era encantado:

f.name: southey
f.string: wherefore

f.name: southey
f.string: she mounted her palfrey and rode away, making great sorrow.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y subió en su palafrén llorando y fuesse luego.

f.name: southey
f.string: The other Damsel then said,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: La otra donzella dixo.

f.name: southey
f.string: Gandales I thank you for what you have done, go and good be with you!

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Gandales yo os agradezco lo que hezistes id a buena ventura:

f.name: southey
f.string: as for this Knight, I pardon him.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: que si este cavallero me erró yo le perdono.

f.name: southey
f.string: That, said Gandales, you may; but I shall not give over the battle, unless he confess himself vanquished.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: De vuestro perdón no sé dixo Gandales mas la batalla no le quito si no se otorga por vencido:

f.name: southey
f.string: She answered, give it over, for though you were the best Knight in the world, I could make him vanquish you.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Quitaréis dixo la donzella que si vos fuessedes el mejor cavallero del mundo haría yo que él os venciesse.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Vos haréis lo que pudierdesdixo él:

f.name: southey
f.string: Then tell me, said he, the meaning of what you said, that I nourished the death of many great personages.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: mas yo no le quitaré si me dezís por qué dexistes que guardava muerte de muchos altos hombres.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Antes os lo diré dixo ella porque a este cavallero amo yo como a mi amigo y a ti como a mi ayudador. Entonces lo apartó y díxole.

f.name: southey
f.string: She made him swear that none should know it from him till she permitted,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Tú me harás pleito como leal cavallero que otro por ti nunca lo sabrá hasta que te lo yo mande/

f.name: montalvo
f.string: él assí lo otorgó:

f.name: southey
f.string: and then said,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y díxole.

f.name: southey
f.string: I tell thee he whom thou foundest in the sea shall be the flower of Knighthood in his time;

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Dígote de aquel que hallaste en la mar que será flor de los cavalleros de su tiempo.

f.name: southey
f.string: he shall cause the strongest to stoop,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Este hará estremecer los fuertes:

f.name: southey
f.string: he shall enterprize and finish with honour that wherein others have failed,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: este començará todas las cosas y acabará a su honra en que los otros fallecieron:

f.name: southey
f.string: and such deeds shall he do

f.name: montalvo
f.string: este fará tales cosas/

f.name: southey
f.string: as none would think could be begun nor ended by body of man.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: que ninguno cuidaría que pudiessen ser començadas ni acabadas por cuerpo de hombre.

f.name: southey
f.string: He shall humble the proud,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Este hará los sobervios ser de buen talante este:

f.name: southey
f.string: and cruel of heart shall he be against those who deserve it,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: avrá crueza de coraçón contra aquellos que se lo merecieren:

f.name: southey
f.string: and he shall be the Knight in the world who most loyally maintains his love,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y aún más te digo que este será el cavallero del mundo que más lealmente manterná amor:

f.name: southey
f.string: and he shall love one answerable to his high prowess.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y amará en tal lugar que conviene a la su alta proeza:

f.name: southey
f.string: And I tell you that on both sides he is of kingly parentage.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y sabed que viene de reyes de ambas partes.

f.name: southey
f.string: Now go thy way, and believe that all this shall come to pass,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Agora te ve dixo la donzella y cree firmemente que todo acaescerá como te lo digo:

f.name: southey
f.string: and if thou discoverest it there shall happen to thee therefore more evil than good.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y si lo descubres venirte ha por ello más de mal que de bien.

f.name: southey
f.string: Ah Lady! said Gandales, tell me for God’s sake where I can find you to talk with you upon this child’s affairs?

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Ay señora dixo Gandales ruégovos por Dios que me digáis dónde vus fallaré para hablar con vos en su hazienda:

f.name: southey
f.string: She answered, that shalt thou never know.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: esto no sabrás tú por mí ni por otro dixo ella.

f.name: southey
f.string: Tell me then your name I beseech you by the faith you owe to the thing in the world that you love best.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Pues dezidme vuestro nombre por la fe que devéis a la cosa del mundo que más amáis.

f.name: southey
f.string: Thou conjurest me so that I will tell:

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Tú me conjuras tanto que te lo diré:

f.name: southey
f.string: but the thing that I love best is that which least loves me,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: pero la cosa que yo más amo sé que más me desama que en el mundo sea:

f.name: southey
f.string: and it is that fair Knight with whom you combated;

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y este es aquel muy fermoso cavallero con quien te combatiste:

f.name: southey
f.string: howbeit I cease not for that to bring him to my will, whatever he can do.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: mas no dexo por ello yo de lo traer a mi voluntad sin que él otra cosa hazer pueda.

f.name: southey
f.string: My name is Urganda the Unknown,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Y sabe que mi nombre es Urganda la Desconocida:

f.name: southey
f.string: mark me well,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: agora me cata bien:

f.name: southey
f.string: and know me again if you can!

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y conósceme si pudieres.

f.name: southey
f.string: And he who first saw her a damsel in her spring time, as one of eighteen years,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Y él que la vio donzella de primero que a su parecer no passava de diez y ocho años:

f.name: southey
f.string: now beheld her so old and overspent, that he marvailed how she could sit upon her horse,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: viola tan vieja y tan lassa que se maravilló como en el palafrén se podía tener:

f.name: southey
f.string: and he crost himself.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y començóse a santiguar de aquella maravilla.

f.name: southey
f.string: She took a perfume box from her bosom and touching it became as she was before.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Cuando ella assí lo vio metió mano a una buxeta que en el regaço traía.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: E poniendo la mano por sí tomó como de primero:

f.name: southey
f.string: Now

f.name: southey
f.string: said she,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y dixo.

f.name: southey
f.string: think you to find me hereafter though you should seek me?

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Parécete que me hallarías aunque me buscasses?

f.name: southey
f.string: weary not yourself for that, for though all living creatures go about it, if I list, they should lose their labour.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Pues yo te digo que no tomes por ello afán que si todos los del mundo me demandassen no me hallarían si yo no quisiesse.

f.name: southey
f.string: As God shall save me, I believe it Lady!

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Assí Dios me salve señora dixo Gandales yo assí lo creo.

f.name: southey
f.string: but I pray you remember the Child who is forsaken of all but myself.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Mas ruégovos por Dios que vos membréis del donzel que es desamparado de todos sino de mí.

f.name: southey
f.string: Doubt not that, said Urganda,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: No pienses en esso dixo Urganda que esse desamparado/

f.name: montalvo
f.string: será amparo y reparo de muchos/

f.name: southey
f.string: I love him more than thou canst think,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y yo lo amo más que tú piensas/

f.name: southey
f.string: for I shall soon receive aid from him twice,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: como quien atiende de él cedo aver dos ayudas:

f.name: southey
f.string: which none else could give me,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: en que otro no podría poner consejo:

f.name: southey
f.string: and he shall receive two guerdons

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y él recebirá dos galardones:

f.name: southey
f.string: to his joy.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: donde será muy alegre/

f.name: southey
f.string: Now God be with thee!

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y agora te encomiendo a Dios/

f.name: montalvo
f.string: que irme quiero/

f.name: southey
f.string: thou shalt see me sooner than thou expectest.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y más aína me verás que piensas.

f.name: southey
f.string: And then she took the shield and helmet of her friend to carry them,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Y tomó el yelmo y escudo de su amigo para se lo llevar.

f.name: southey
f.string: and Gandales seeing his head disarmed thought him the goodliest Knight that he had ever beheld,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Y Gandales que la cabeça le vio desarmada parecióle el más hermoso cavallero que nunca viera.

f.name: southey
f.string: and so they parted.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: E assí se partieron de en uno.

f.name: southey
f.string: As Gandales returned to his Castle

f.name: montalvo
f.string: que partido de Urganda tornóse para su castillo:

f.name: southey
f.string: he found that other Damsel by the way; sitting beside a fountain and lamenting.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y en el camino halló la donzella que andava con el amigo de Urganda que estava llorando cabe una fuente:

f.name: southey
f.string: She knew him and exclaimed,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y como vio a Gandales conociólo y dixo.

f.name: southey
f.string: whom you helped has not destroyed you?Wicked she is not, said Gandales, but good and wise,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Qué es esso cavallero cómo no vos fizo matar aquella alevosa a quién ayudavades Alevosa no es ella dixo Gandales mas buena y sabida:

f.name: southey
f.string: and if you were a Knight I would make you pay dearly for the folly of your words.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y si fuessedes cavallero yo vos haría comprar bien la locura que dexistes.

f.name: southey
f.string: Ah, the wretch, quoth she, how she knows to beguile every one!

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Ay mezquina dixo ella cómo sabe a todos engañar.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Y qué engaño vos hizo dixo él?

f.name: southey
f.string: she has taken from me the fair Knight

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Que me tomó aquel hermoso cavallero que vistes/

f.name: southey
f.string: who would more willingly be mine,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: que por su grado más comigo haría vida que con ella. Esse engaño a sí lo hizodixo él:

f.name: southey
f.string: but I will be revenged if I can.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Comoquiera que sea dixo ella si puedo yo me vengaré.

f.name: southey
f.string: Gandales answered, it is a wild thought to hope to injure her who knows your very intentions,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Desvario pensáis dixo Gandales en querer enojar aquella que no solamente antes que obréis más que lo penséis lo sabrá.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Agora vos id dixo ella que muchas vezes los que más saben caen en los lazos más peligrosos.

f.name: southey
f.string: and as for the Knight,

f.name: southey
f.string: it seems to me that you are both without reason or conscience.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: pues que fuera de razón y de conciencia vos y ella lo tenéis según me parece.

f.name: southey
f.string: With that he left her and came to his castle,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Gandales la dexó y fue como ante su camino cuidando en la fazienda de su donzel:

f.name: southey
f.string: and seeing the little boy come running towards him,

f.name: southey
f.string: he took him up in his arms,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y llegando al castillo ante que se desarmasse le tomó en sus braços:

f.name: southey
f.string: and lovingly embraced him, and remembering all that Urganda had told him,

f.name: southey
f.string: he said in his heart,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: diziendo en su coraçón.

f.name: southey
f.string: my fair child God let me live to see thy good days!

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Mi hermoso hijo si querrá Dios que yo llegue al vuestro buen tiempo .

f.name: southey
f.string: and with that the tears came.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y començólo de besar viniéndole las lágrimas a los ojos

f.name: southey
f.string: At this time the child was of three years,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: En esta sazón avía el donzel tres años/

f.name: southey
f.string: and his beauty was marvellous to behold,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y su gran hermosura por maravilla era mirada:

f.name: southey
f.string: and he seeing the tears, put up his

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y como vio a su amo llorar púsole las

f.name: southey
f.string: little

f.name: southey
f.string: hands to wipe them away,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: manos ante las ojos como que se los quería limpiar/

f.name: southey
f.string: whereat Gandales rejoiced

f.name: montalvo
f.string: de que Gandales fue alegre:

f.name: southey
f.string: as a sign that

f.name: montalvo
f.string: considerando que siendo en más edad:

f.name: southey
f.string: he would be gentle-hearted,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: más se dolería de su tristeza y púsole en tierra y fuese a desarmar/

f.name: southey
f.string: and thenceforward he taught him with a kinder will.And when he came to the age of five,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y dende adelante con mejor voluntad curava de él y tanto que llegó a los cinco años.

f.name: southey
f.string: he made a bow for him suited to his strength, and another for his son Gandalin,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Entonces le fizo un arco a su medida y otro a su hijo Gandalín:

f.name: southey
f.string: and they used to shoot before him.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y fazíalo tirar ante sí:

f.name: southey
f.string: When

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Pues a esta sazón

f.name: southey
f.string: he was seven years old,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y assí lo fue criando hasta la edad de siete años.

f.name: southey
montalvo
f.string: el rey Languines passando por su reino con su muger y toda la casa de una villa a otra y vínose al castillo de Gandales que por ahí era el camino:

f.name: southey
f.string: where they were well feasted;

f.name: montalvo
f.string: donde fue muy bien festejado:

f.name: southey
f.string: but the Child of the Sea, and Gandalin and the other children were removed to the back Court

f.name: montalvo
f.string: mas a su Donzel del Mar y a su hijo Gandalín y a otros donzeles mandólos meter en un corral/

f.name: southey
f.string: that they might not be seen.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: porque no lo viessen:

f.name: southey
f.string: It fortuned that

f.name: southey
f.string: the Queen was lodged in one of the highest apartments of the Castle, and looking from her window she saw the children at play with their bows,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y la reina que en lo más alto de la casa posava mirando de una finiestra vio los donzeles que con sus arcos tiravan:

f.name: southey
f.string: and among them remarked the Child of the Sea for his shapeliness and beauty,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y al Donzel del Mar entre ellos tan apuesto y tan hermoso:

f.name: montalvo
f.string: que mucho fue de lo ver maravillada:

f.name: southey
f.string: and he was better clad than his companions,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y violo mejor vestido que todos/

f.name: southey
f.string: of whom he looked like the Lord.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: assí que parescía el señor:

f.name: southey
f.string: The Queen

f.name: southey
f.string: called to her Ladies and Damsels,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y de que no vio ninguno de la compañía de don Gandales a quien preguntasse llamó sus dueñas y donzellas y dixo.

f.name: southey
f.string: come and see the fairest creature that ever was seen!

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Venid y veréis la más fermosa criatura que nunca fue vista.

f.name: southey
f.string: While they were looking at him,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Pues estándole mirando todos como a una cosa muy extraña y crecida en fermosura:

f.name: southey
f.string: the Child who was thirsty, laid down his bow and arrows, and went to a water-pipe to drink.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: el Donzel uvo sed y poniendo su arco y saetas en tierra fuesse a un caño de agua a bever.

f.name: southey
f.string: A boy bigger than the rest took up his bow to shoot with it,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Y un donzel mayor que los otros tomó su arco y quiso tirar con él:

f.name: southey
f.string: this Gandalin would not suffer,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: mas Gandalín no lo consintió:

f.name: southey
f.string: the other struck him

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y el otro empuxólo rezio.

f.name: southey
f.string: angrily

f.name: southey
f.string: and Gandalin cried out,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Gandalín dixo.

f.name: southey
f.string: Help me, Child of the Sea!

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Acorredme Donzel del Mar:

f.name: southey
f.string: He hearing this ran to him,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y como lo oyó dexó de bever y fuese contra el gran donzel:

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y él le dexó el arco:

f.name: southey
f.string: and snatched the bow

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y tomólo con su mano/

f.name: southey
f.string: and crying,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y dixole.

f.name: southey
f.string: in an ill minute did you strike my brother

f.name: montalvo
f.string: En mal punto heristes a mi hermano:

f.name: southey
f.string: struck him on the head with all his force;

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y diole con él por cima de la cabeça gran golpe según su fuerça/

f.name: southey
f.string: they fought

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y traváronse ambos:

f.name: southey
f.string: awhile

f.name: southey
f.string: till the other was fain to run away,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: assí que el gran donzel malparado començó a fuir:

f.name: southey
f.string: and meeting their Tutor,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y encontró con el ayo que los guardava:

f.name: southey
f.string: who asked what was the matter,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y dixo Qué has?

f.name: southey
f.string: replied, that the Child of the Sea had beat him.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: El Donzel del Mar dixo me firió.

f.name: southey
f.string: The Tutor went towards him with the strap in his hand,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Entonces fue a él con la correa y dixo.

f.name: southey
f.string: how is this, Child of the Sea, said he, that you dare beat the boys?

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Cómo Donzel del Mar ya sois osado de ferir los moços:

f.name: southey
f.string: I shall punish you!

f.name: montalvo
f.string: agora veréis cómo os castigaré por ello:

f.name: southey
f.string: but the Child fell upon his knees,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: él hincó los inojos ante él/

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y dixo.

f.name: southey
f.string: I had rather you would strike me, said he, than that any one before me should dare to beat my brother>; and the tears came in his eyes.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Señor más quiero que me vos hiráis que delante de mí sea ninguna osado de hazer mal a mi hermano:

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y viniéronle las lágrimas a los ojos:

f.name: southey
f.string: The Tutor was moved, and told him

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y el ayo uvo manzilla y díxole.

f.name: southey
f.string: to do so no more.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: Si otra vez lo hazéis yo os haré bien llorar.

f.name: southey
f.string: All this the Queen saw,

f.name: montalvo
f.string: La reina vio bien todo esto/

f.name: southey
f.string: and she wondered why they called him the Child of the Sea.

f.name: montalvo
f.string: y maravillóse por qué a aquel llamavan Donzel del Mar.
